Step 2

Review your pricing...

[vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron pricing-details grp-smb-standard-reveal”]

1,500 Contact Plan$550/mo*

  • Users: Unlimited
  • Support/Training: Unlimited
  • Dedicated Onboarding Specialist

*With annual contract. Month-to-month options available.

Get started for as little as$3,169

Includes $2,399 onboarding package. We’re holding your hand for the first 60 days, priming you for success.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron pricing-details grp-smb-plus-reveal”]

10,000 Contact Plan$850/mo*

  • Users: Unlimited
  • Support/Training: Unlimited
  • Dedicated Onboarding Specialist

*With annual contract. Month-to-month options available.

Get started for as little as$3,589

Includes $2,399 onboarding package. We’re holding your hand for the first 60 days, priming you for success.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron pricing-details grp-smb-pro-reveal”]

20,000 Contact Plan$1,250/mo*

  • Users: Unlimited
  • Support/Training: Unlimited
  • Dedicated Onboarding Specialist

*With annual contract. Month-to-month options available.

Get started for as little as$4,149

Includes $2,399 onboarding package. We’re holding your hand for the first 60 days, priming you for success.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron pricing-details grp-smb-agency-reveal”]

Agency Plan

We offer unbeatable pricing for marketing agencies. Just ask the nearly 2,000 agency partners that have already joined us.

Please use the form to sign up for a demo and receive customized pricing for your Agency plan.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron pricing-details grp-smb-enterprise-reveal”]

Enterprise Plan

Got millions of contacts and emails? Let’s chat about customizable plans to fit your needs.

Please use the form to sign up for a demo and receive customized pricing for your Enterprise plan.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-1 vc_col-lg-5″]

Step 3

Fill out the form to request a demo...

[vc_column_text el_class=”a-b-test-original”]

Get a Live Demo

of SharpSpring Marketing Automation

Do you work at a marketing agency?*
yesno

YesNo

We’re committed to keeping your info safe. Privacy Policy

[/vc_column_text][vc_raw_html el_class=”a-b-test-variant-1 hidden”][/vc_raw_html][vc_raw_html el_class=”a-b-test-variant-2 hidden”][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css_animation=”fadeIn” css=”.vc_custom_1553284556525{margin-bottom: 2% !important;padding-top: 2% !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_hidden-xs”]

[vc_column]

All plans include a full set of powerful features.

[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-0 vc_col-md-offset-0 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-offset-1″]

Full Marketing Automation

[vc_empty_space height=”10px”]

Chatbots

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-0 vc_col-md-offset-0 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-offset-1″]

Campaign Tracking

[vc_empty_space height=”10px”]

Dynamic Landing Pages

[vc_empty_space height=”10px”]

Reporting and Analytics

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-0 vc_col-md-offset-0 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-offset-1″]

Behavior-Based Email

[vc_empty_space height=”10px”]

CRM & Sales Automation

[vc_empty_space height=”10px”]

Sales Dialer

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css_animation=”fadeIn” css=”.vc_custom_1553284513203{margin-bottom: 2% !important;padding-top: 2% !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”hidden-lg hidden-md hidden-sm”][vc_column offset=”vc_hidden-lg vc_hidden-md vc_hidden-sm”]

[vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1535742843862{padding-top: 0px !important;}”]

All plans include a full set of powerful features.

[vc_row_inner gap=”30″ css=”.vc_custom_1509651038775{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_inner offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-0 vc_col-md-offset-0 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-offset-1″ css=”.vc_custom_1535742853240{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron”]
